snippet: A scholar known for his criticism of the discrimination against Uighurs, a predominantly Muslim ethnic group, has been detained by the police, his wife said.
abstract: Chinese authorities detain Ilham Tohti, Uighur scholar known for his criticism of discrimination against Uighurs.
